EmailTemplate.description: Notification of Service Request CSB Activity is past dueÂ
EmailTemplate.name: Service Request_Notification CSB Activity Past Due
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of Service Request {!Service_Request__c.Name} CSB Activity is past due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your SR {!Service_Request__c.Name} CSB Number {!Service_Request__c.CSB_Number__c} Activity Expected date is past due
Please review and update as needed.
Click on the below link to view details: {!Service_Request__c.Link}
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time Internal Honeywell Use Only
